name: P.A.R.I.S. La nuit en marche
description:
P.A.R.I.S. La Nuit en Marche is a project that explores the violence experienced by generations of students in the student district of the capital of France. This release is a prototype / demo.

This is a prototype realised for the #HPS1Jam. I wanted to experiment with the ps1 horror game atmosphere, a graphical style works well with terror, magical realism, and slow-paced experiences. During this jam I worked mainly on the scripts, the interactions, the pacing of the game, the textures and the pixelated filter.

The project started as a student project, where I mainly worked with Probuilder and Unity’s FPS controller to create the game space.

 

Made with Unity using Unity’s FPS controller, probuilder and progrid.

I used the movie “Censier en grève -1986” made by the film studies students from Paris 3 (https://academia.hypotheses.org/8840) and the music video for Kate Bush’s “Sat in Your Lap” (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-4csr6pLZLg).

Textures from texture.com.
